channel.description:
LOOKING FOR A GOOD CODER/WEBSITE DESIGNER LOOKING FOR A GOOD CODER/WEBSITE DESIGNER LOOKING FOR A GOOD CODER/WEBSITE DESIGNER LOOKING FOR A GOOD CODER/WEBSITE DESIGNER LOOKING FOR A GOOD CODER/WEBSITE DESIGNER

CAN ANYONE MAKE ME A LOGO AND A BACKGROUND FOR ME I WANNA SEE SOME OF YOUR WORKS SO I CAN HIRE YOUS OR NOT PUT IN THE LOGO PK X ILE
MY SERVER IS GROWING RAPIDLY AND I NEED SOME HELP LIKE A TEAM FOR THE SERVER BECUZ SERVER IS GETTING BIG AND I CANT CONTROLL IT ALL
MY SERVER IS GROWING RAPIDLY AND I NEED SOME HELP LIKE A TEAM FOR THE SERVER BECUZ SERVER IS GETTING BIG AND I CANT CONTROLL IT ALL
MY SERVER IS GROWING RAPIDLY AND I NEED SOME HELP LIKE A TEAM FOR THE SERVER BECUZ SERVER IS GETTING BIG AND I CANT CONTROLL IT ALL
MY SERVER IS GROWING RAPIDLY AND I NEED SOME HELP LIKE A TEAM FOR THE SERVER BECUZ SERVER IS GETTING BIG AND I CANT CONTROLL IT ALL
PK X ILE is running on a powerful Intel i7 920, 8x 2.66 GHz with Hyperthreading technology, 8GB ram Dedicated server with 100mbit uplink. Which is why we have a guarenteed 99.99% uptime.
We at PK X ILE strive for an enjoyable gaming experience for all of our players. Our Destkop client and Webclient support Windows (X86 + X64), Mac and Linux operating systems. You don’t need a hardcore gaming computer to experience the awesomeness of PK X ILE.
Recent updates have delivered us some of the coolest content, while the rest is still being worked on...
Such as
* The newest achievement capes: Max cape, Completionist cape, Veteran cape,... * Korasi’s sword 100% working, magic based makes it unaffected by melee prayer * New Nex armour (Virtus, Pernix and Torva), with lifepoint boosting * Ancient Curses: Turmoil, Soul Split, Sap and Leech prayers, Wrath,... * Dungeoneering equipment, such as Primal and Chaotic, colored infinity robes, PVP equipment, Dragon claws and alot more * Smooth 1 click object, NPC and monster interacting * The original Runescape Fight pits minigame with Champion skulls, waiting room, Timers and a custom Tokkul exchange shop * 100 percent clipped walking and following (Player and NPC combat following and regular Player following) * Perfect banking with tabs, searching and item switching. * Active community (250+ online at all times) * Skillers friendly, wide variety of trainable skills * Stable economy, no overpriced or underpriced items * All the major Runescape bosses (Corporeal Beast, Tz-tok-Jad, Tormented Demon, Full Godwars) * Organized forums for fast and easy support

item.title: Pk x ile UPDATED ADDED NEW THING MUST SEE!
item.dc:creator: @leboaymen leboaymen
item.description:
@leboaymen wrote:

x[quote=“purestmage74, post:16, topic:408530”][center][i][b]Wow, now this i’d really be interested in helping with.
I have my own custom 317 loading 602, maxed out about all the features i can add.
I’m online everyday, all day, usually on my website.
I own a domain, own a vps, plus webhosting so i do have some REAL experience.
I have made my own website and am still working on it, everything is done from a blank page 100% legit coding.
I’'m able to protect webpage sources.
Problem is i’ve been looking for a 614 to own, host myself.
Seeing that this one has tremendous progress done i’m willing to dedicate myself to development of this servers:

~Forums~
~Website Design~
~Gfx~
~Server-Sided Coding~
~Maybe even some Client sided updates?~

I have much time to spare as i have said.
I don’t have a msn or hotmail i do have a yahoo email i check daily.

techaneena69@yahoo.com

Please reply asap, maybe we can talk about this instantly in a chat box and maybe get some ideas going, and some info shared.

Gabriel.[/b][/i][/center][/quote]

ile make a yahoo account and add you

Read full topic

PLEASE APPLY BY REPLYING WHAT YOU ARE CAPABLE OF

CAN ANYONE MAKE ME A LOGO AND A BACKGROUND FOR ME I WANNA SEE SOME OF YOUR WORKS SO I CAN HIRE YOUS OR NOT PUT IN THE LOGO PK X ILE

MY SERVER IS GROWING RAPIDLY AND I NEED SOME HELP LIKE A TEAM FOR THE SERVER BECUZ SERVER IS GETTING BIG AND I CANT CONTROLL IT ALL

MY SERVER IS GROWING RAPIDLY AND I NEED SOME HELP LIKE A TEAM FOR THE SERVER BECUZ SERVER IS GETTING BIG AND I CANT CONTROLL IT ALL

PK X ILE is running on a powerful Intel i7 920, 8x 2.66 GHz with Hyperthreading technology, 8GB ram Dedicated server with 100mbit uplink. Which is why we have a guarenteed 99.99% uptime.

We at PK X ILE strive for an enjoyable gaming experience for all of our players. Our Destkop client and Webclient support Windows (X86 + X64), Mac and Linux operating systems. You don’t need a hardcore gaming computer to experience the awesomeness of PK X ILE.

Recent updates have delivered us some of the coolest content, while the rest is still being worked on…

Such as

  • The newest achievement capes: Max cape, Completionist cape, Veteran cape,…
  • Korasi’s sword 100% working, magic based makes it unaffected by melee prayer
  • New Nex armour (Virtus, Pernix and Torva), with lifepoint boosting
  • Ancient Curses: Turmoil, Soul Split, Sap and Leech prayers, Wrath,…
  • Dungeoneering equipment, such as Primal and Chaotic, colored infinity robes, PVP equipment, Dragon claws and alot more
  • Smooth 1 click object, NPC and monster interacting
  • The original Runescape Fight pits minigame with Champion skulls, waiting room, Timers and a custom Tokkul exchange shop
  • 100 percent clipped walking and following (Player and NPC combat following and regular Player following)
  • Perfect banking with tabs, searching and item switching.
  • Active community (250+ online at all times)
  • Skillers friendly, wide variety of trainable skills
  • Stable economy, no overpriced or underpriced items
  • All the major Runescape bosses (Corporeal Beast, Tz-tok-Jad, Tormented Demon, Full Godwars)
  • Organized forums for fast and easy support
